page.title: 11KATHERINE LADY BERKELYS SCH.
page.content: K.L.B.S Is the oldest in Wotton,Founded by Lady Berkelyin 1384 for six scholars.To-day there are 1048 pupils aged 11-18 years old.531 Boys 517 Girls. The pupils come from Wottons two Junior schools and nine other local schools in surrounding villiges.The Wotton pupils walkto while the other come by school buses.Pupils have to wear a school uniform.This is a burgandy blazer with the Berkeley crest badge with white or blue shirt and a school tie.Boys wear black or grey trousers.Girls grey skirts.Six former boys wear black or grey suits and the girls black or grey dress or black skirts with white blouse. there are 58 teachers who teach 40 different subjects.Most pupils leave at 16 after taking C.S.E (Certificate in secondary education) and 'O'levels.
